Package story.book

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RequestingActivity
    Classes that want to use the RequestTextDialog need to implement this interface to get the returned text.
    StoryController
    StoryController interface for getting Story objects, lists of stories and saving stories.
    StoryView<M>
    Base View interface for the application Views.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationFragment
    Annotation fragment is the right tab in StoryFragmentReadActivity This is the view for displaying all image annotations posted by users on the currently open in Reading Fragment (reading tab)
    Dashboard
    Activity that serves as the main menu where the user can navigate to a list of their local stories or to a list of online stories.
    DecisionBranch
    Represents a decision that a reader of the story can take.
    DecisionBranchCreationController
    Controller responsible for adding and removing DecisionBranch objects to a StoryFragment.
    DecisionPickerActivity
    DecisionPickerActivity lets the author select a fragment and a title to create a decision branch for the current story fragment being edited.
    EditStoryInformationActivity
    Activity that allows the user to edit the information of their story or enter information for their newly created story.
    FragmentCreationController
    Controller responsible for adding and removing Illustration objects of a StoryFragment object for the StoryFragmentEditActivity.
    Illustration
    Base class for Illustrations.
    LocalEditingController
    Base abstract class for controllers for providing saving functionality to controllers modifying the currently active Story object.
    LocalStoriesActivity
    Activity that allows the user to create new stories, delete stories, edit stories, or select a story to read from a list of their locally stored stories.
    LocalStoryController
    Story controller for the LocalStoriesActivity to manage locally stored stories.
    OnlineStoriesActivity
    Activity that allows the user to view stories from an available list of stories online and download them to their local stories list.
    OnlineStoryController
    StoryController to read and download locally stored stories.
    ReadingFragment
    ReadingFragment is the interface users can use to read story fragments.
    RequestTextDialog
    RequestTextDialog is a DialogFragment to get some text and return it to its calling activity.
    SimpleWarningDialog
    This is a facade for creating a simple warning dialog with title, message, and a confirmation button.
    Story
    Main class for representing stories which extends the abstract class StoryModel.
    StoryApplication
    Application class for aggregating the Singleton IOClient, ESClient, and the active instance of Story.
    StoryCreationController
    Controller responsible for creating and editing instances of Story for the StoryFragmentListActivity.
    StoryFragment
    Model class for representing fragments of a story which extends the abstract class StoryModel.
    StoryFragmentEditActivity
    StoryFragmentEditActivity is the interface users can make changes to illustrations contained in the story fragment which is currently open.
    StoryFragmentListActivity
    StoryFragmentListActivity displays all story fragments contained in the story that is currently open.
    StoryFragmentReadActivity
    StoryFragmentReadActivity is an interface for users to read a story fragment (left tab), as well as an interface for users to add annotations (right tab) on the story fragment which is currently being read.
    StoryInfo
    Class representing additional information about a Story object.
    StoryInfoActivity
    Activity that allows the user to view the information of their story and then view the story.
    StoryInfoController
    Controller responsible for creating, editing, displaying the StoryInfo of the current Story for the StoryInfoActivity and EditStoryInformationActivity.
    StoryListActivity  
    StoryModel<V extends StoryView>
    Template model class for the application.
    StoryReadController
    Controller for accessing the current story and starting fragment for reading and adding annotations.
    TabListener
    TabListener implements the ActionBar.TabListener to allow switching between fragment views for the story and annotation portions when reading a story fragment.
    TextIllustration
    Illustration class with textual content.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    StoryInfo.PublishState
    Defines the different publishing states of the story.
